name: Beard Balm
ingredients: Shea butter, Coconut oil, Jojoba oil, Beeswax, Tea tree oil, Rosemary oil
benefits: Softens and conditions beard hair, Light to medium hold, Reduces Itch and Irritation, Promotes Healthy Growth, Hydrates and Nourishes Skin, Adds Shine and Luster, Improved manageability

name: Body Scrub
ingredients: Sugar, Coconut oil, Avocado oil, Vitamin E oil, Body wash, Fragrance
benefits: Gentle exfoliation, Hydration, Improved Skin Texture, Radiant glow, Soothing and nourishing

name: Hair Oil
ingredients: Castor oil, Rosemary oil, Lavender oil, Coconut oil, Avocado oil, Jojoba oil, Tea tree oil
benefits: Stimulates hair growth, Strengthens and reduces breakage, Deep Hydration, Soothes scalp Irritation, Improved Manageability

name: Lip Balm
ingredients: Beeswax, Coconut oil, Shea butter, Vitamin E oil
benefits: Intense moisture, Protective barrier, Soothes and heals irritates lips, Soft and smooth lips, Prevents chapping, Comfortable feel

name: Lip Oil
ingredients: Castor oil, Jojoba oil, Coconut oil, Carrot oil, Vitamin E oil
benefits: Hydration, Glossy shine, Nourishment and revitalization, Lightweight Feel

name: Body Oil
ingredients: Coconut oil, Jojoba oil, Avocado oil, Carrot oil, Vitamin E oil, Castor oil, Lavender oil
benefits: Hydration, Nourishing, Soft,smooth and supple skin, Lightweight Feel, Relaxing and soothing, Improved Skin Texture and tone

name: Body Butter
ingredients: Jojoba oil, Shea butter, Coconut oil, Beeswax, Vitamin E oil, Arrowroot powder
benefits: Hydration , Protective barrier, Soft and smooth skin, Non-greasy feel, Nourishing and revitalizing, Improved Skin texture
